name: rehumanize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to give back to someone the human qualities of independent thought, feeling for other people, etc.; to make something more suitable for human beings: We are trying to rehumanize a group of people who have been dehumanized. Several recent films have tried to rehumanise the 1970s. Related word
humanize
More examplesFewer examplesThe author has delved deep into her subject's past in order to rehumanize her.The new president is now promising to re-humanise our society.He was one of the first people to re-humanize the region for its neighbours.
